mapper.select: select * from recruit order by rno asc
mapper.insert: insert into recruit (rno, id, rtitle, rpw, ronoff, rcategory, rcomment, rregion, rgroup, rstep, rindent ) values(recruit_seq.nextval,#{id}, #{rtitle}, #{rpw}, #{ronoff}, #{rcategory}, #{rcomment}, #{rregion}, recruit_seq.currval,0,0)
mapper.update: update recruit set rcnt = rcnt + 1 where rno = #{rno}
